help.de: Diese Notenrolle kannst du benutzen, um das Lied „The Measure of Our Reach“ deinem Orchestrion hinzuzufügen.
help.en: Music roll for The Garlean Territorial Anthem for Gyr Abania and Surrounding States - The Measure of Our Reach. Use to add to your orchestrion list.
help.fr: Un rouleau de papier spécial permettant de jouer le morceau “The Measure of Our Reach” sur un orchestrion.
help.jp:
オーケストリオン譜面帳楽曲登録
「我らが支配圏」の旋律が記されたオーケストリオン譜
